scenario_text.value:
What is this place?
It looks really dangerous.
Is this...an altar?
Takuma! Over there!
(Miyuki is tied to the altar!)

The special sacrificial ceremony is underway.
You will not interfere.
Yikes! Piedmon?!
He’s like...a creepy clown.

You can tell how powerful he is just by
looking at him, though. Piedmon is strong!

Sacrificial ceremony?
We can’t let that happen! Give her back!

Your voice lacks conviction.
I can tell how much you fear me.
Rk...

His powers are immense.
But we can’t just flee!

I dunno what this ceremony is for, but you
won’t get away with involving us in it!

Why is it so cold all of a sudden? Just
watching that makes me start to shiver...
I’m not scared of you! Nooo way!

The weakest dogs always howl the loudest.
You are pitiful.

But weaklings have their uses. We shall
sacrifice you to the Master as well.

They’re going to use us too?
Not just Miyuki?
Why is a sacrifice needed? What’s it for?

To cleanse the impurities that spread across
this land. To fulfill the Master’s wishes.

You ignorant weaklings! Curse your idiocy as
you are consumed!
